column4: Is there a "task manager" equivalent in Linux?  I have Ekiga session that seems to have crashed and will not close.
pkill <name> or xkill will give you a nice killer cursor to click with
but yes there is a task manager gui under system options i think
ps -A | grep -i ekiga | awk "{print $ 1}" | xargs -i kill -9 {}    ;-p
